main event: A UFO was observed in Wayzata, Minnesota on July 27, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright light, brighter than the brightest stars., The sighting lasted for about 3-4 minutes., The object did not move, appeared to stand still, and faded slowly., Witnesses included the report's author, their mother, and father., The object had a ruby-like color and no sound was reported during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: 17 years old male, part of a student organization focused on investigating aerial phenomena.
